value.title: AZ-400: Facilitate communication and collaboration
value.excerpt:
Learn how DevOps capabilities such as continuous planning and continuous collaboration help you communicate deployment and release information with business stakeholders.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
topItems.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

images.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration

value.title: AZ-104: Monitor and back up Azure resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor resources by using Azure Monitor and implement backup and recover in Azure. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

value.title: AZ-400: Develop a Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) strategy
value.excerpt:
Learn how Site Reliability Engineering enables you to sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
topItems.excerpt: Organizations big and small have started to realize just how crucial system and application reliability is to their business. Theyâ€™ve also learned just how difficult it is to maintain that reliability while iterating at the speed demanded by the marketplace. Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a proven approach to this challenge.

images.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)

topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure

topItems.excerpt: Use application logs in Azure Web Apps to help debug web app code.

images.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

images.title: Manage site reliability

value.title: Evolve your DevOps practices
value.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to your end users. Azure DevOps is a set of services that gives you the tools you need to do just that. With Azure DevOps, you can build, test, and deploy any application, either to the cloud or on premises. DevOps practices that enable transparency, cooperation, continuous delivery and continuous deployment become embedded in your software development lifecycle.

Create automated pipelines that continuously build, test, package, and deploy your applications.

value.title: Build great solutions with the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how to design and build secure, scalable, high-performing solutions in Azure using the pillars of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
topItems.excerpt: You want to build great things on Azure, but youâ€™re not sure exactly what that means. Using key principles throughout your architecture regardless of technology choice, can help you design, build, and continuously improve your architecture.

images.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: NoSQL data is an efficient way to store information that doesnâ€™t map to the requirements of a relational SQL database. Learn how to use the Azure portal, the Azure Cosmos DB extension for Visual Studio Code, and the Azure Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK to work with your NoSQL data where you want, and provide your users with high availability, no matter where they are in the world.

Learn how GitHub enables you to build a modern source control strategy that fosters collaboration and enables you to automate your build and deployment processes.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

value.title: Build JavaScript applications with Node.js
value.excerpt: Node.js provides a large set of built-in APIs that help you build various types of applications, command-line apps, web apps, and more. It also offers testing and debugging capabilities and a rich ecosystem of third-party packages that you can easily add to your application.

value.title: Protect identity and access with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: The **Identity and Access learning path** covers the latest identity and access technologies, tools for strengthening authentication, and guidance on identity protection within your organization. Microsoft access and identity technologies enable you to secure your organizationâ€™s identity, whether it is on-premises or in the cloud, and empower your users to work securely from any location.
